con:part.con:content: <definitions name="Imei" targetNamespace="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/wmb/imei" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:this="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/wmb/imei" xmlns:types="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/imei" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <documentation> <appinfo source="WMQI_APPINFO"> <MRWSDLAppInfo imported="true"> <binding hasEncoding="false" imported="true" name="ImeiBinding" originalBindingStyle="document"/> </MRWSDLAppInfo> </appinfo> </documentation> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import schemaLocation="imei.xsd" namespace="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/imei"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="consultarImeiACMsg"> <part element="types:request" name="parameters"/> </message> <message name="consultarImeiACMsgResponse"> <part element="types:response" name="parameters"/> </message> <message name="consultarImeiACFault"> <part element="types:error" name="parameters"/> </message> <portType name="ImeiPort"> <operation name="consultarImeiAC"> <input message="this:consultarImeiACMsg"/> <output message="this:consultarImeiACMsgResponse"/> <fault message="this:consultarImeiACFault" name="fault"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="ImeiBinding" type="this:ImeiPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="consultarImeiAC"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gms/sistemasadministrativos/wmb/imei/consultarImeiAC"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="ImeiService"> <port binding="this:ImeiBinding" name="Imei"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:7800/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/wmb/ImeiService"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/imei" xmlns="http://www.telcel.com.mx/di/sds/gsm/sistemasadministrativos/imei" xmlns:ibmSchExtn="http://www.ibm.com/schema/extensions" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element ibmSchExtn:docRoot="true" name="request" type="RequestType"/> <xsd:element ibmSchExtn:docRoot="true" name="response" type="ResponseType"/> <xsd:element ibmSchExtn:docRoot="true" name="error" type="ErrorType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="codigo" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="imeiRegionFormato"/> <xsd:element name="imei" type="imeiFormato"/> <xsd:element name="datosIgtoc25c" type="DatosIgtoc25C" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="codigo" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="claveSap" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="marca" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="modelo" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="grupoArticulo" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="datosIgtoc25c" type="DatosIgtoc25C" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DatosIgtoc25C"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="modelo" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="numImei" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="marca" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ErrorType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="codigo" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="descripcion" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="imeiRegionFormato"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="|R0[1-9]"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="imeiFormato"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="|[0-9]{15}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>
